nodes.bodyText: I think a new bitvector is also empty

I think the 'bound' part should be part of the enum values and not the enum type, since it smells like past tense 'bind' on its own. Maybe FilterType or FilterConstraint, with UPPER_BOUND and LOWER_BOUND
Also add a comment describing the difference between the two.
setInterval also invalidates the cached count
I think empty is better than aborting

nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: I still do not think you need to clear an empty bitvector
